short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Align RTL text to the right in LinkedIn comments and posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Align LinkedIn RTL is a Chrome extension that enhances the visual presentation of LinkedIn posts and comments in right-to-left languages, including Hebrew, Arabic, Farsi, and Urdu. By aligning the text to the right, this extension improves readability and provides a more visually coherent experience for users engaging with content in these languages on LinkedIn.

Changelog
Version 1.1 - Released on October 15, 2024

New Feature: The extension now aligns text to the right while you input comments or posts, ensuring a consistent right-to-left experience from the moment you start writing.

Behavior Update: If RTL content is deleted during input, the text alignment will automatically revert back to left-to-right (LTR).
